name: Power Disc Slam
overview: Power Disc Slam is no simple park throw about with your dog. It's an intense arcade sports game pitting you against the best. Choose your favorite character and take to the court to show off your skills. Learn to slide, spin and trick your opponent. Watch out for Cooper's fearsome power, Mariana's speed, Henrik's long reach and Adeline's trickery! Be alert as each surface plays differently and the scoring layouts change. When you are ready challenge your friends with Local Play, or connect to the internet and play matches against players from around the world. Can you become a Power Disc Slam master?
